mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,b.nickName adminNickName,b.avatar adminAvatar,a.updateDate, a.viewTimes,a.picUrl,c.name typeName,c.id typeId FROM t_blog a,t_admin b,t_type c WHERE a.blogAdminId=b.id and a.blogTypeId=c.id and a.published='on'
SELECT b.name typeName,a.blogTypeId typeId,COUNT(a.id) countBlog FROM t_blog a,t_type b WHERE a.blogTypeId=b.id and a.published='on' GROUP BY a.blogTypeId,b.name ORDER BY COUNT(a.id) DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT b.name tagName,b.id tagId,COUNT(c.blogId) countBlog FROM t_blog a,t_tag b,t_link c WHERE a.id=c.blogId and b.id=c.tagId and a.published='on' GROUP BY b.id,b.name ORDER BY COUNT(c.blogId) DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT a.title,a.id FROM t_blog a where a.recommend='on' and a.published='on' ORDER BY a.updateDate DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.description,b.nickName adminNickName,b.avatar adminAvatar, a.updateDate,a.viewTimes,a.picUrl,c.name typeName,c.id typeId FROM t_blog a,t_admin b,t_type c WHERE a.blogAdminId=b.id and a.blogTypeId=c.id and a.published='on' and (a.title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or a.description LIKE concat('%',#{query},'%'))
